metadata.description:
Adora and the Distance is a YA fantasy graphic novel following the epic adventures of Adora, a brave young woman of color who lives in a fantastical world with underground pirates, ghosts, and a mysterious force called "The Distance" which threatens to destroy it all.

Part of the comiXology Originals line of exclusive digital content only available on comiXology and Kindle. On release, each title will be available as part of comiXology Unlimited, Kindle Unlimited and Prime Reading.
metadata.name: Adora and the Distance (comiXology Originals)
